course_details: C is a general-purpose high level language that was originally developed by Dennis Ritchie for the Unix operating system.
An algorithm is a well-defined step-by-step procedure to transform a given input into the desired output to solve a computational problem.
C++ is a powerful and popular programming language often used in competitive programming and DSA courses due to its efficiency and versatility.
Arrays, linked lists, stacks, queues, hash tables, trees, heaps, and graphs are the basic data structures.
In Python, object-oriented Programming (OOPs) is a programming paradigm that uses objects and classes in programming.
Software engineering is the branch of computer science that deals with the design, development, testing, and maintenance of software applications.
Amazon Web Services (AWS) is a leading cloud computing platform that offers a wide range of cloud services, including computing power, storage, databases, machine learning, analytics.
The full form of MYSQL is My Structured Query Language. It is a popular open-source relational database management system (RDBMS) that is used for storing and managing data.
Problem-solving is a crucial skill in various aspects of life, from personal challenges to professional tasks.
